title: Welcome to Introduction to Computer Science
content: Welcome to CS101! This course will introduce you to fundamental programming concepts. Please make sure you have Python installed on your computer and join our Discord server for discussions.

title: Assignment 1 Posted
content: Programming Assignment 1 has been posted. It's due September 15th at 11:59 PM. Please read the instructions carefully and don't hesitate to ask questions during office hours.

title: Office Hours Update
content: My office hours for this week have been moved to Thursday 2-4 PM instead of Wednesday due to a conference. Location remains the same: Engineering Building 301.

title: Midterm Exam Schedule
content: The midterm exam will be held on October 25th during regular class time. It will cover all material from weeks 1-8. Study guide will be posted next week.

title: Welcome to Calculus I
content: Welcome to MATH151! This course covers differential calculus and its applications. Please bring a graphing calculator to each class and review your trigonometry before our next meeting.

title: Problem Set 1 Solutions Posted
content: Solutions to Problem Set 1 have been uploaded to the course portal. Please review them carefully and come to office hours if you have any questions about the solution methods.

title: Welcome to Psychology 101
content: Welcome to Introduction to Psychology! This course will explore the scientific study of behavior and mental processes. Please purchase the required textbook and complete the online syllabus quiz by Friday.

title: Research Paper Guidelines
content: Detailed guidelines for the research paper have been posted. Remember to use APA format and include at least 5 peer-reviewed sources. The paper should be 5-7 pages, double-spaced.
